content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much are you looking to spend on rent each month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a great question, Herr Schmidt. I'm a student so I'm looking for something affordable. I was thinking of something around 500 Euros a month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, 500 Euros is a very reasonable budget for a student. However, considering the prime location of this apartment and the recent construction, I think we can offer you a slightly better deal. How does 480 Euros sound to you? It's a great price for an apartment of this quality in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer, Herr Schmidt. 50 square meters in the city center for 480 Euros is a good deal. However, I'm a student and I want to get the best deal possible. Can you do any better?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're looking for the best deal, Maryam. I appreciate your honesty. Let's see what we can do. How about 470 Euros per month? This is a special offer for students, considering the amenities and the location. It's a steal! What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a great offer, Herr Schmidt. However, I'm a student and every euro counts. Can you do any better? I'm willing to sign a two-year contract if it helps.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your commitment to a two-year contract is very appealing. Let's make a deal. How about 460 Euros per month? This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to waive the security deposit if you agree to this price. It's a win-win situation for both of us. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a great offer, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to waive the security deposit. I accept your offer. I agree to the price of 460 Euros [460] Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Maryam! You've made a wise decision. This apartment will be a great place for you to live and study. We'll prepare the lease agreement for you to sign. Thank you for choosing our property. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
